title: Reports - Cost per Day
content: In the Report > Costs section, we give you the possibility to edit a Cost per Day report.This report is based on forecast data defined in the Sales/Cost ratios section, unlike the Hours Worked Summary report which is based only on working hours.1. Creation of Sales / Costs ratiosTo learn more about this function, see the article Management of sales and sales/cost ratios.Here is the Sales / Costs ratio, defined for one day for 2 departments.2. Generate the Cost per day reportOn the main menu, click on Reports  menu,In the Reports - Costs, click on Cost per Day,Complete the information in the necessary fields,Click on Report (Excel) to generate your report.Helpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
